titles.title: I Have a Friend Who Loves Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// I have a friend who loves me
Who loves me, who loves me
I have a friend who loves me
And Jesus is His name. //

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He loves me, He loves me
He loves me with a tender love
He loves me, He loves me
And Jesus is His name.
